version.releaseNotes:
Milestone version of Clover for IDEA

This is a @IDEA_RELEASE_NUM@ milestone release of Clover for IDEA.

This version contains changes that have not been thoroughly tested, if in doubt please use the stable release.

Thank you for helping improve Clover for IDEA - your feedback is important to us.
If you experience any difficulties using this version, or have any suggestions as to how we can improve Clover, please let us know.

Main changes to the stable 3.1.0 version:

  • NADA yet
  • Other minor changes
